scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.closure: java -jar node_modules/google-closure-compiler-java/compiler.jar --compilation_level SIMPLE --warning_level QUIET --formatting SINGLE_QUOTES --language_in ECMASCRIPT_2017 --language_out ECMASCRIPT_2017 --js build/potree.js --js_output_file build/potree.min.js
scripts.pub: npm run build && npm publish --access public .
